title: Los Hombres Calientes
text:
Los Hombres Calientes was a New Orleansâ€“based jazz group. They are most associated with Latin jazz, especially Afro-Cuban jazz, and contemporary jazz. Their 1998 self-titled debut was praised by the New Orleans Times-Picayune. Bill Summers, Irvin Mayfield and Jason Marsalis were among the founding members.


== Discography ==
Los Hombres Calientes (1998)
Los Hombres Calientes Volume 2 (1999)
Los Hombres Calientes Volume 3: New Congo Square (2000)
Los Hombres Calientes Volume 4: Vodou Dance (2003)
Los Hombres Calientes Volume 5: Carnival (2005)
